page:
lulzJS is a solo project that aims to transform Javascript into a general purposes language.

It's a solo project for the moment because I like to do things in a certain way and I'm really obsessive about it.
Help is always appreciated anyway, so don't be shy and contact me :3
At the moment the development is focused on the Framework, it's a mix of things that I like from other languages like Python/Ruby/C#.Net.
